song_name: That's How Strong My Love Is
lyrics:

some people they call me crazy
for falling in love with you
they can take me and lock me away baby
cause theres nothing those bars can do

prechorus 1
ill be the rising moon after the setting sun
just to let you know youll always have someone

chorus
through the shake of an earthquake i will never fall
thats how strong my love is
like a ship through the storm we can risk it all

verse 2
i used to feel kinda lonely
cause the world it can be so fake
and all that matters im telling you is you and me only
and the fortress from love we make

prechorus 2
ill be the water you need in the desert land
just to let you know youll always have my hand
ill be the woman you need to be a better man
so youll always know
